page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT IN CUMBERNAULD
page.content: People work in 4 main areas here _ the {Town centre}and the{Industrial Estates of Westfield,West Lenziemill and Blairlinn. These estates are located on the outskirts of the town,{away {from the houses. The factories are all {modern}in design and neatly laid out. They produce goods which are light and are easily moved around by road. This area has been more fortunate than other parts of the country in that fewer factories are closing down putting people out of work. This is because it is a{new town}and many factories are given{help, such as grants and loans,} from the Development Corporation to help them. The other main area of employment is the Town Centre where people work in the{shops and offices. An important employer here is the{ {Inland Revenue offfice.}
